ApplyConfigToMachineGroup.title: ApplyConfigToMachineGroup
ApplyConfigToMachineGroup.summary: Applies a Logtail configuration to a machine group.

CallAiTools.title: CallAiTools
CallAiTools.summary: Calls observable AI tools. The capabilities of these tools are continuously updated. You can call the tool list API to retrieve the currently supported capabilities.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a resource belongs.

ConsumerGroupHeartBeat.title: ConsumerGroupHeartBeat
ConsumerGroupHeartBeat.summary: A consumer sends a heartbeat to the server to maintain its active status.

ConsumerGroupUpdateCheckPoint.title: ConsumerGroupUpdateCheckPoint
ConsumerGroupUpdateCheckPoint.summary: Updates the checkpoint of a shard for a consumer group.

CreateAlert.title: CreateAlert
CreateAlert.summary: Creates an alert rule in a project.

CreateConsumerGroup.title: CreateConsumerGroup
CreateConsumerGroup.summary: Creates a consumer group for a Logstore.

CreateDomain.title: CreateDomain
CreateDomain.summary: Binds a new custom domain name to a project.

CreateDownloadJob.title: CreateDownloadJob
CreateDownloadJob.summary: Creates a log download task in a specified project.

CreateETL.title: CreateETL
CreateETL.summary: Creates a data transformation job in a specified project.

CreateLogging.title: CreateLogging
CreateLogging.summary: Enables the service log feature for a project.

CreateMaxComputeExport.title: CreateMaxComputeExport
CreateMaxComputeExport.summary: Creates a MaxCompute data shipping job.

CreateMetricStore.title: CreateMetricStore
CreateMetricStore.summary: Creates a Metricstore to store metrics.

CreateOSSExport.title: CreateOSSExport
CreateOSSExport.summary: Exports logs from a Logstore to an OSS bucket.

CreateOSSHDFSExport.title: CreateOSSHDFSExport
CreateOSSHDFSExport.summary: Creates an export job from OSS to HDFS in a specified project.

CreateOSSIngestion.title: CreateOSSIngestion
CreateOSSIngestion.summary: Creates an OSS import task in a specified project.

CreateS3Ingestion.title: CreateS3Ingestion
CreateS3Ingestion.summary: Creates a job to import files from S3.

CreateScheduledSQL.title: CreateScheduledSQL
CreateScheduledSQL.summary: Creates a scheduled SQL job in a specified project.

CreateSqlInstance.title: CreateSqlInstance
CreateSqlInstance.summary: If you use Standard SQL to analyze a large volume of data, a single query may not be able to scan all logs within a specified time range, which can result in incomplete data. Adding shards improves read and write performance, but this change applies only to new data. To analyze a larger volume of data in a single query, you can enable Dedicated SQL and increase its compute resources.

CreateTicket.title: CreateTicket
CreateTicket.summary: Obtains a ticket. Simple Log Service allows you to share the query and analysis pages and dashboard pages with other users and embed the console pages into third-party systems. This way, other users can view your logs in password-free mode. The URLs of the shared pages are referred to as password-free URLs. You can call the CreateTicket operation to obtain a ticket and generate a password-free URL based on the ticket and the URL of the console page that you want to share.

DeleteAnnotationDataSet.title: DeleteAnnotationDataSet
DeleteAnnotationDataSet.summary: Deletes a dataset. You can delete a dataset only if it contains no data structures.

DeleteCollectionPolicy.title: DeleteCollectionPolicy
DeleteCollectionPolicy.summary: Deletes a log collection rule for an Alibaba Cloud product.

DeleteDomain.title: DeleteDomain
DeleteDomain.summary: Deletes a custom domain name that is bound to a project.

DeleteIndex.title: DeleteIndex
DeleteIndex.summary: Deletes an index of a Logstore.

DeleteLogStore.title: DeleteLogStore
DeleteLogStore.summary: Deletes a Logstore, including all shards and indexes in the Logstore.

DeleteLogging.title: DeleteLogging
DeleteLogging.summary: Deletes the service log for a specified project.

DeleteMachineGroup.title: DeleteMachineGroup
DeleteMachineGroup.summary: Deletes a machine group. If the Logtail configurations for log collection are applied to a machine group, the configurations are disassociated from the machine group after the machine group is deleted.

DeleteMaxComputeExport.title: DeleteMaxComputeExport
DeleteMaxComputeExport.summary: Deletes a MaxCompute data shipping job.

DeleteMetricStore.title: DeleteMetricStore
DeleteMetricStore.summary: Deletes an existing Metricstore. When you delete a Metricstore, the metric data stored in the Metricstore and associated resources such as associated collection settings and transformation settings are also deleted.

DeleteOSSExport.title: DeleteOSSExport
DeleteOSSExport.summary: Deletes a specified OSS data shipping job.

DeleteOSSHDFSExport.title: DeleteOSSHDFSExport
DeleteOSSHDFSExport.summary: Deletes an OSS-HDFS data shipping job.

DeleteStoreView.title: DeleteStoreView
DeleteStoreView.summary: Deletes a dataset by using the name of the dataset.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Returns a list of active regions.

GetAlert.title: GetAlert
GetAlert.summary: Queries the information about an alert rule.

GetAnnotationData.title: GetAnnotationData
GetAnnotationData.summary: Retrieves a data struct from a dataset by its unique identity.

GetAnnotationLabel.title: GetAnnotationLabel
GetAnnotationLabel.summary: Retrieves a label table by its ID.

GetAppliedConfigs.title: GetAppliedConfigs
GetAppliedConfigs.summary: Queries the Logtail configurations that are applied to a machine group.

GetAppliedMachineGroups.title: GetAppliedMachineGroups
GetAppliedMachineGroups.summary: Queries the machine groups to which a Logtail configuration is bound.

GetAsyncSql.title: GetAsyncSql
GetAsyncSql.summary: Retrieves the status and results of an asynchronous SQL query.

GetCheckPoint.title: GetCheckPoint
GetCheckPoint.summary: Queries the checkpoints of a shard from which data is consumed by a consumer group.

GetCollectionPolicy.title: GetCollectionPolicy
GetCollectionPolicy.summary: You can call the GetCollectionPolicy operation to retrieve the details of a specific rule.

GetConfig.title: GetConfig
GetConfig.summary: Queries the details of a Logtail configuration.

GetConsumeProcessor.title: GetConsumeProcessor
GetConsumeProcessor.summary: Retrieves the details of a consume processor.

GetContextLogs.title: GetContextLogs
GetContextLogs.summary: Queries the contextual logs of a specified log.

GetCursor.title: GetCursor
GetCursor.summary: Retrieves a cursor based on a specified time.

GetCursorTime.title: GetCursorTime
GetCursorTime.summary: Retrieves the server time that corresponds to a cursor.

GetDownloadJob.title: GetDownloadJob
GetDownloadJob.summary: Retrieves information about a download task.

GetETL.title: GetETL
GetETL.summary: Retrieves the configuration of a specified extract, transform, and load (ETL) job.

GetHistograms.title: GetHistograms
GetHistograms.summary: You can call the GetHistograms operation to query the distribution of logs that meet the search criteria in a specified Logstore.

GetIndex.title: GetIndex
GetIndex.summary: Queries the index of a Logstore.

GetIngestProcessor.title: GetIngestProcessor
GetIngestProcessor.summary: Retrieves information about an ingest processor.

GetLogStore.title: GetLogStore
GetLogStore.summary: Retrieves the details of a Logstore.

GetLogStoreMeteringMode.title: GetLogStoreMeteringMode
GetLogStoreMeteringMode.summary: Queries the billing mode of a Logstore.

GetLogging.title: GetLogging
GetLogging.summary: Queries the service log configuration of a project.

GetLogs.title: GetLogs
GetLogs.summary: This operation queries log data in a Logstore of a specified project.

GetLogsV2.title: GetLogsV2
GetLogsV2.summary: Queries raw logs from a specified logstore in a project. The response contains raw logs from a specified time range and is compressed for transmission.

GetLogtailPipelineConfig.title: GetLogtailPipelineConfig
GetLogtailPipelineConfig.summary: Queries the information about a Logtail pipeline configuration.

GetMLServiceResults.title: GetMLServiceResults
GetMLServiceResults.summary: Alibaba Cloud Simple Log Service (SLS) provides intelligent analysis for data such as logs, metrics, and traces. You can call models to obtain analysis results directly. Its main features include Named Entity Recognition (NER) for log data, anomaly detection for time series data, and root cause analysis for high-latency trace spans.

GetMachineGroup.title: GetMachineGroup
GetMachineGroup.summary: Queries the details of a machine group.

GetMaxComputeExport.title: GetMaxComputeExport
GetMaxComputeExport.summary: Queries a MaxCompute data shipping job.

GetMetricStoreMeteringMode.title: GetMetricStoreMeteringMode
GetMetricStoreMeteringMode.summary: Queries the billing mode of a Metricstore.

GetOSSExport.title: GetOSSExport
GetOSSExport.summary: Retrieves the specified OSS data shipping job.

GetOSSHDFSExport.title: GetOSSHDFSExport
GetOSSHDFSExport.summary: Retrieves the details of a specified OSS-HDFS delivery job.

GetOSSIngestion.title: GetOSSIngestion
GetOSSIngestion.summary: Retrieves a specified OSS import job.

GetProject.title: GetProject
GetProject.summary: Queries the details of a project.

GetProjectLogs.title: GetProjectLogs
GetProjectLogs.summary: Queries logs in a project. You can use this operation to query logs at the project level.

GetS3Ingestion.title: GetS3Ingestion
GetS3Ingestion.summary: Retrieves information about an S3 import task.

GetScheduledSQL.title: GetScheduledSQL
GetScheduledSQL.summary: Retrieves the specified Scheduled SQL job.

GetSlsService.title: GetSlsService
GetSlsService.summary: Call the GetSlsService operation to retrieve the activation status of Simple Log Service. The endpoint must be China (Shanghai) or Singapore.

GetSqlInstance.title: GetSqlInstance
GetSqlInstance.summary: Queries information about the Dedicated SQL instance of a project, such as the number of compute units (CUs) and whether the Dedicated SQL instance is enabled by default. Before you call this operation, you must create a Dedicated SQL instance by calling the CreateSqlInstance or UpdateSqlInstance operation.

GetStoreView.title: GetStoreView
GetStoreView.summary: Queries the configurations of a dataset by using the name of the dataset.

GetStoreViewIndex.title: GetStoreViewIndex
GetStoreViewIndex.summary: Queries the indexes of a dataset by using the name of the dataset. Only datasets of the logstore type are supported.

ListAiTools.title: ListAiTools
ListAiTools.summary: Lists the AI tools provided by the observability service, including Copilot capabilities for various services.

ListAlerts.title: ListAlerts
ListAlerts.summary: Lists the alert rules in a specified project.

ListAnnotationData.title: ListAnnotationData
ListAnnotationData.summary: Lists the data records in a specified dataset.

ListAnnotationDataSets.title: ListAnnotationDataSets
ListAnnotationDataSets.summary: Returns a list of dataset structs.

ListCollectionPolicies.title: ListCollectionPolicies
ListCollectionPolicies.summary: Lists the collection rules for logs from Alibaba Cloud services.

ListConfig.title: ListConfig
ListConfig.summary: Queries all Logtail configurations in a project.

ListConsumeProcessors.title: ListConsumeProcessors
ListConsumeProcessors.summary: Lists the consume processors that meet specified conditions.

ListConsumerGroup.title: ListConsumerGroup
ListConsumerGroup.summary: Queries all consumer groups of a Logstore.

ListDomains.title: ListDomains
ListDomains.summary: Queries the custom domain names that are bound to projects.

ListDownloadJobs.title: ListDownloadJobs
ListDownloadJobs.summary: Lists the log download jobs in a specified project.

ListETLs.title: ListETLs
ListETLs.summary: Lists the data transformation jobs in a project.

ListIngestProcessors.title: ListIngestProcessors
ListIngestProcessors.summary: Lists ingest processors that meet the specified conditions.

ListLogStores.title: ListLogStores
ListLogStores.summary: Queries all Logstores or Logstores that match specific conditions in a project.

ListLogtailPipelineConfig.title: ListLogtailPipelineConfig
ListLogtailPipelineConfig.summary: Lists the names of Logtail pipeline configurations that meet specified criteria.

ListMachineGroup.title: ListMachineGroup
ListMachineGroup.summary: Queries the machine groups of a project.

ListMachines.title: ListMachines
ListMachines.summary: Queries a list of machines that are connected to Simple Log Service in a specified machine group.

ListMetricStores.title: ListMetricStores
ListMetricStores.summary: Queries the list of Metricstores in a project. You can use fuzzy search to query the Metricstores by Metricstore name.

ListOSSExports.title: ListOSSExports
ListOSSExports.summary: Queries the OSS shipping jobs in a specified project.

ListOSSHDFSExports.title: ListOSSHDFSExports
ListOSSHDFSExports.summary: Lists the OSS-HDFS export tasks in a specified project.

ListOSSIngestions.title: ListOSSIngestions
ListOSSIngestions.summary: Lists OSS import tasks in a specified project.

ListProject.title: ListProject
ListProject.summary: Lists projects that meet the specified criteria.

ListSavedSearch.title: ListSavedSearch
ListSavedSearch.summary: Queries a list of saved searches.

ListScheduledSQLs.title: ListScheduledSQLs
ListScheduledSQLs.summary: Lists the Scheduled SQLs in a specified project.

ListShards.title: ListShards
ListShards.summary: Queries a list of shards in a Logstore.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries a list of tags for one or more resources. You can query tags for resources by resource type or filter resources by tag. Each tag is a key-value pair.

OpenSlsService.title: OpenSlsService
OpenSlsService.summary: Activates Simple Log Service. You must use the endpoint for Simple Log Service only in the China (Shanghai) or Singapore region.

PullLogs.title: PullLogs
PullLogs.summary: Call the PullLogs operation to retrieve log data from a specified cursor position. This operation retrieves raw logs. To query or analyze logs, call the GetLogsV2 operation.

PutAnnotationData.title: PutAnnotationData
PutAnnotationData.summary: Stores annotation data in a dataset.

PutConsumeProcessor.title: PutConsumeProcessor
PutConsumeProcessor.summary: Creates or updates a consume processor.

PutIngestProcessor.title: PutIngestProcessor
PutIngestProcessor.summary: Creates or modifies an ingest processor.

PutLogs.title: PutLogs
PutLogs.summary: Writes log data to a specified logstore.

PutWebtracking.title: PutWebtracking
PutWebtracking.summary: Sends multiple logs to Simple Log Service in one request.

RefreshToken.title: RefreshToken
RefreshToken.summary: Refreshes an access token using a ticket. The access token is used to call console API operations.

RemoveConfigFromMachineGroup.title: RemoveConfigFromMachineGroup
RemoveConfigFromMachineGroup.summary: Removes a Logtail configuration from a machine group.

SplitShard.title: SplitShard
SplitShard.summary: Splits a shard in the readwrite state.

StartMaxComputeExport.title: StartMaxComputeExport
StartMaxComputeExport.summary: Starts a MaxCompute data shipping job.

StartOSSExport.title: StartOSSExport
StartOSSExport.summary: Starts an Object Storage Service (OSS) data shipping job.

StartOSSHDFSExport.title: StartOSSHDFSExport
StartOSSHDFSExport.summary: Starts an OSS-HDFS data shipping job.

StartOSSIngestion.title: StartOSSIngestion
StartOSSIngestion.summary: Starts a specified OSS import task.

StopETL.title: StopETL
StopETL.summary: Stops a specified data transformation task.

StopMaxComputeExport.title: StopMaxComputeExport
StopMaxComputeExport.summary: Stops a MaxCompute data shipping job.

StopOSSExport.title: StopOSSExport
StopOSSExport.summary: Stops an Object Storage Service (OSS) data shipping job.

StopOSSHDFSExport.title: StopOSSHDFSExport
StopOSSHDFSExport.summary: Stops an OSS-HDFS data shipping job.

StopOSSIngestion.title: StopOSSIngestion
StopOSSIngestion.summary: Stops the specified OSS import task.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to a resource. You can add tags only to projects.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Detaches one or more tags from a resource. You can detach tags only from Simple Log Service projects. You can detach multiple or all tags from a Simple Log Service project at a time.

UpdateAnnotationLabel.title: UpdateAnnotationLabel
UpdateAnnotationLabel.summary: Updates a label table. You can update only the names of labels in a label set.

UpdateConsumerGroup.title: UpdateConsumerGroup
UpdateConsumerGroup.summary: Updates the attributes of a consumer group.

UpdateETL.title: UpdateETL
UpdateETL.summary: Updates the configuration of a specified data transformation task and restarts it.

UpdateIndex.title: UpdateIndex
UpdateIndex.summary: Updates the indexes of a Logstore.

UpdateLogStore.title: UpdateLogStore
UpdateLogStore.summary: Updates the properties of a Logstore.

UpdateLogStoreEncryption.title: UpdateLogStoreEncryption
UpdateLogStoreEncryption.summary: Updates the encryption configuration of a Logstore. You can create encryption configurations for the Logstore and enable or disable the encryption feature.

UpdateLogStoreMeteringMode.title: UpdateLogStoreMeteringMode
UpdateLogStoreMeteringMode.summary: Changes the billing mode of a Logstore.

UpdateLogStoreProcessor.title: UpdateLogStoreProcessor
UpdateLogStoreProcessor.summary: Updates the ingest processor for a Logstore.

UpdateLogging.title: UpdateLogging
UpdateLogging.summary: Updates the service log configurations of a project.

UpdateMachineGroup.title: UpdateMachineGroup
UpdateMachineGroup.summary: Modifies the configuration of a machine group.

UpdateMachineGroupMachine.title: UpdateMachineGroupMachine
UpdateMachineGroupMachine.summary: Modifies the machines in a machine group. You can add machine to or remove machines from the machine group.

UpdateMaxComputeExport.title: UpdateMaxComputeExport
UpdateMaxComputeExport.summary: Updates a MaxCompute data shipping job.

UpdateMetricStore.title: UpdateMetricStore
UpdateMetricStore.summary: Updates the configuration of an existing Metricstore. A Metricstore is used to store metrics.

UpdateMetricStoreMeteringMode.title: UpdateMetricStoreMeteringMode
UpdateMetricStoreMeteringMode.summary: Updates the billing mode of a specified Metricstore.

UpdateMetricStoreProcessor.title: UpdateMetricStoreProcessor
UpdateMetricStoreProcessor.summary: Updates the ingest processor that is associated with a Metricstore.

UpdateOSSExport.title: UpdateOSSExport
UpdateOSSExport.summary: Updates an Object Storage Service (OSS) data shipping job.

UpdateOSSHDFSExport.title: UpdateOSSHDFSExport
UpdateOSSHDFSExport.summary: Updates an OSS-HDFS data shipping job.

UpdateOSSIngestion.title: UpdateOSSIngestion
UpdateOSSIngestion.summary: Updates the specified OSS import task.

UpdateScheduledSQL.title: UpdateScheduledSQL
UpdateScheduledSQL.summary: Updates the specified scheduled SQL task.

UpdateSqlInstance.title: UpdateSqlInstance
UpdateSqlInstance.summary: When you use Standard SQL to analyze large amounts of data, a single query may not scan all logs within a specific time range, which can result in incomplete data. Although adding shards improves read and write performance, this improvement applies only to new data. To analyze more data in a single query, enable Dedicated SQL and add more compute resources.

UpdateStoreView.title: UpdateStoreView
UpdateStoreView.summary: Updates the configurations of a dataset.

UpsertCollectionPolicy.title: UpsertCollectionPolicy
UpsertCollectionPolicy.summary: Creates a log collection policy for a cloud service. This way, logs can be automatically collected from the service.
